sentences.en: British supermodel Naomi Campbell has interviewed Venezuela's President Hugo Chavez, describing him as a "rebel angel" who is unafraid to speak his mind but poses no threat to democracy.

sentences.en: British tabloids reported that supermodel, Naomi Campbell , recently made a scene at a London restaurant.

sentences.en: Why don't we get the most popular supermodel to be the spokesperson?

sentences.en: Your girlfriend is pretty, but she's no supermodel.
